entry.title: Portland mayor excoriates Trump: 'It's you who have created the hate'

media:group.media:title: Portland mayor excoriates Trump: 'It's you who have created the hate'
media:group.media:description: The Democratic mayor of Portland, Oregon, said it is President Donald Trump who "created the hate" in an unyielding attack on the White House following a shooting at a protest that left one person dead. Wheeler's message provoked a string of tweets from the President, who rebuked Wheeler's news conference plea to Trump to let him, as mayor, handle the unrest. #CNN #News

entry.title: Night of deadly Portland violence yields pointed responses

media:group.media:title: Night of deadly Portland violence yields pointed responses
media:group.media:description: After a night of deadly protest violence in Portland, Oregon, officials responded in starkly different ways. CNN's Wolf Blitzer has the latest from Mayor Ted Wheeler, President Donald Trump and Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden. #CNN #News

entry.title: Historian debunks misconception that racism is a Southern issue

media:group.media:title: Historian debunks misconception that racism is a Southern issue
media:group.media:description: In light of deadly unrest following the Jacob Blake shooting, officials in Wisconsin are expressing concerns as President Donald Trump plans to visit Kenosha. Historian and University of Wisconsin professor Christy Clark-Pujara joins CNN's Bianna Golodryga to dispel the notion that racism is primarily a Southern issue. #CNN #News

entry.title: Expert compares Trump's politics to fascism

media:group.media:title: Expert compares Trump's politics to fascism
media:group.media:description: Yale philosophy professor Jason Stanley explains why he claims President Donald Trump's politics are akin to fascism, a political movement based around a leader.

entry.title: Here's a look at the latest Covid-19 numbers in the US

media:group.media:title: Here's a look at the latest Covid-19 numbers in the US
media:group.media:description: CNN's John King breaks down the newest coronavirus case counts in the US. #CNN #News

entry.title: Smerconish: Can civil unrest re-elect Donald Trump?

media:group.media:title: Smerconish: Can civil unrest re-elect Donald Trump?
media:group.media:description: Three months ago, none of us knew the names of George Floyd or Jacob Blake. Now their deaths - and the reactions to them - could be pivotal in the Presidential race. #CNN #News

entry.title: Schiff responds to Trump's accusation of security leaks

media:group.media:title: Schiff responds to Trump's accusation of security leaks
media:group.media:description: House Intelligence Chairman Adam Schiff says it is possible the House could decide to subpoena Director of National Intelligence John Ratcliffe to testify before Congress, a day after the nation's top intelligence office informed Congress it'll no longer deliver in-person briefings on election security issues. #CNN #News

entry.title: Trump's making a bad situation worse, Harvard professor says

media:group.media:title: Trump's making a bad situation worse, Harvard professor says
media:group.media:description: Harvard Kennedy School professor Cornell William Brooks responds to the announcement that President Donald Trump will visit Kenosha, Wisconsin, to meet with law enforcement and survey protest damage. The former NAACP president explains to CNN's Wolf Blitzer how the visit turns the city into "a political prop." #CNN #News

entry.title: Obama counseled some NBA players amid multi-day protest

media:group.media:title: Obama counseled some NBA players amid multi-day protest
media:group.media:description: ESPN host Stephen A. Smith and CNN’s Ana Cabrera discuss NBA playoffs resuming after multi-day protests, and how former President Obama counseled some NBA players amid the strike. #CNN #News

entry.title: Tributes for Chadwick Boseman pour in from friends and co-stars

media:group.media:title: Tributes for Chadwick Boseman pour in from friends and co-stars
media:group.media:description: Chadwick Boseman, who died after a battle with colon cancer, was someone who on the big screen brought to life heroes like Jackie Robinson and Thurgood Marshall and fictional ones, like the Black Panther. CNN's Stephanie Elam, also a fellow Howard University alum, takes a look back at Boseman's illustrious legacy. Meanwhile Dr. Richina Bicette examines health disparities relating to race and how colorectal cancers disproportionately affect African Americans at earlier ages. #CNN #News

entry.title: Intel chief tells Congress it will no longer brief them on election security

media:group.media:title: Intel chief tells Congress it will no longer brief them on election security
media:group.media:description: The Office of the Director of National Intelligence has informed the House and Senate Select Committees on Intelligence that it'll no longer be briefing on election security issues, according to letters obtained by CNN and a senior administration official. Instead, as CNN's Jeremy Diamond reports, ODNI will primarily provide written updates to the congressional panels, the official said. Meanwhile former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper explains to CNN's Bianna Golodryga why he finds it "amazing and disturbing" that President Donald Trump's intelligence chief would do this ahead of the 2020 election. #CNN #News

entry.title: Jacob Blake’s family speaks at Wisconsin march

media:group.media:title: Jacob Blake’s family speaks at Wisconsin march
media:group.media:description: Jacob Blake’s sister and other family members joined protesters in Kenosha, Wisconsin, to march and speak against police brutality and racial inequalities in the US. #CNN #News

entry.title: 'Black Panther' star Chadwick Boseman dies at 43

media:group.media:title: 'Black Panther' star Chadwick Boseman dies at 43
media:group.media:description:
Chadwick Boseman, the man who brought "Black Panther" to life, has died. The actor has been battling colon cancer since 2016 and died at home with his family and wife by his side, according to a statement posted on his Twitter account. He was 43, his publicist Nicki Fioravante said in a statement. "A true fighter, Chadwick persevered through it all, and brought you so many of the films you have come to love so much," the statement said. "From Marshall to Da 5 Bloods, August Wilson's Ma Rainey's Black Bottom and several more, all were filmed during and between countless surgeries and chemotherapy." The statement said the role of King T'Challa was the "honor of (Boseman's) career."
#BlackPanther #ChadwickBoseman #CNN #News

entry.title: Ex-pool attendant details relationship with Falwells

media:group.media:title: Ex-pool attendant details relationship with Falwells
media:group.media:description:
Former Miami hotel pool attendant Giancarlo Granda describes his years-long intimate relations with Jerry Falwell's wife, Becki, which he says Falwell enjoyed watching.​ In a statement to CNN, Falwell Jr. acknowledged the affair, but denied he was involved in it.
#Falwells #CNN #News

entry.title: New audio of Trump's sister: Ivanka Trump is a mini-Donald

media:group.media:title: New audio of Trump's sister: Ivanka Trump is a mini-Donald
media:group.media:description: Maryanne Trump Barry, President Donald Trump's sister, is heard on secret audio recordings made by his niece, Mary Trump, criticizing Ivanka and Eric Trump, describing the former as a "mini-Donald." #Trump #CNN #News
